Pre-Game Insights: Both teams are under pressure to bring their campaign back on track in the ODI World Cup.
Sri Lanka has won three out of the last four ODIs against Australia.
Australia's batting lineup has struggled, with veterans David Warner and Steve Smith yet to score big runs.
Sri Lanka's bowling attack has been trounced in the initial stage of the ODI World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the Ekana Cricket Stadium was good for batting, allowing South Africa to post a total in excess of 300.
The average first-innings score at this venue is 250, which can be breached when Australia takes on Sri Lanka.
